meanings.definition: A unit of pressure equal to one thousand pascals.
meanings.sent1: The tire pressure was measured in kilopascals.
meanings.sent2: Scientists use kilopascals to measure pressure in experiments.
meanings.sent3: The balloon popped because it couldn't handle the kilopascals inside.
meanings.sent4: The tension in the room was like kilopascals building up before a storm.
meanings.sent5: The sound of the explosion echoed with the force of kilopascals.

meanings.definition: A measurement used in the field of physics and engineering to quantify pressure.
meanings.sent1: The engineer calculated the stress on the bridge in kilopascals.
meanings.sent2: Physics students learn to convert kilopascals to other pressure units.
meanings.sent3: The pressure gauge broke, and kilopascals were flying everywhere!
meanings.sent4: The weight of responsibility felt like kilopascals on his shoulders.
meanings.sent5: The tension in the air was palpable, like kilopascals waiting to be released.
